title: A Seething Anger: Episode 252
description:
Tulse Hill, south London.  Daniel Joseph was deaf and mute and struggled at school and to learn. And the anger he felt continued to build, until one day it all came to the surface with shocking results. This week, on the UK True Crime Podcast, I tell that story.

1, Writing Credit: Chris Wood

2,  Please buy my book 'Gone Fishing' about the life and crimes of Angus Sinclair.
